title: Need proactive risk mitigation measures to tackle cyberattacks: RBI DG
description: RBI deputy governor Swaminathan J emphasized proactive risk mitigation strategies in the face of cyberattacks and emerging banking risks, addressing challenges in regulations, corporate governance, and assurance functions to ensure bank safety and stakeholder trust.
